title: WHEN I PLAY RANKED MY GAME CRASHES AND A BLUESCREEN APPEARS :/
body: Last 4 games i played ranked my complete pc crashed.

replies.body: There must be a critical driver or hardware problem if your PC is completely crashing in-game.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look.  If possible, grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to attach logs to your ticket for context.  We'll get back to you!
